welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kingsville, the charming city known for its southern hospitality and rich history. We invite you to explore our vibrant community and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NAS Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alice International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Alice International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Corpus Christi International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Corpus Christi International Airport serves regional and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network.
